Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio's HR led the Brewers to a 9-3 win over the Cardinals
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Brewers needed to win by 2 runs or more to cover the spread and they did
The over/under was 7.5 and the teams scored 12 runs, so people who bet the over won
The Brewers won at -170 odds so a bet of $170 won $270 total
Others: Freddy Peralta got the win (10-7) with 5.1 IP, 6 H, 3 ER, 3 K
Andre Pallante took the loss (6-7) with 5.0 IP, 5 H, 5 ER, 3 K
